column4: ok, BIG TIME rookie mistake.  I accidently removed the firefox dir under /opt
After your done laughing, can some please tell me how I reinstall firefox
all:  should i try to install 1.07 or 1.5?
synaptic can reinstall a package, which you should do anyway, but 1.5 is nicer if you can be arsed with the wiki instructions :)
I tried System->Administration->Synaptic Package Manager.  Selected Reinstall for firefox, firefox gnome support and mozilla-firefox-local-en-gb and hit Apply.  Do i need to do anything else?
